1230380.name: Bogatyr Soundtrack
1230380.description:
Bogatyr Soundtrack by Alexey Popov

Bogatyr is the game about ancient Rus warrior who returned home after 10 years of devastating war just to find his land ruined. With the hero you are about to find out what lies behind this and save this land or destroy it completely.

Soundtrack for this game suites perfectly to represent ancient Rus spirit. It feels like a perfect piece of art to complete gameplay and may be fully positioned as independent musical product. Composed and performed by one man only, Alexey Popov, multiinstrumentalist.
1230380.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
